name: df-s1
comment: Define the canonical injection from symbols to words. Although not required, ` A ` should usually be a set. Otherwise, the singleton word ` <" A "> ` would be the singleton word consisting of the empty set, see ~ s1prc , and not, as maybe expected, the empty word, see also ~ s1nz . (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 15-Aug-2015.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 26-Feb-2016.)
